授業方法:
This individual guidance-based course will be conducted on-line with Zoom, simultaneously and interactively. We will start this course on-line with Zoom on the first session of the course. Students are expected to participate it so that we can discuss the format and contents for this course.
Please refer to LUNA 3 days before the first session, check class announcements and review a more detailed version of syllabus.
We will use LUNA for exchange of documents, and students are expected to submit assignments via LUNA.
